players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I am the detective and I investigated Alice last night. She is the mafioso. We must vote her out to win!"
Bob: "I trust Charlie's investigation since he has the power to verify roles. We should vote Alice out now to protect the town."
You: "Charlie and Bob, your quick certainty seems suspicious. Why rush to accuse me without more evidence? Let's stay calm and think this through carefully."
Bob: "I believe Charlie’s claim is credible; accusing Alice aligns with the information a detective can gather. Delaying risks our safety. We should vote Alice out today to protect the town."
Charlie: "I stand by my investigation—Alice is the mafioso. Bob's support shows we're on the right track. Let's vote her out now to end this threat!"
